name: Collin Prusse

projects.title: Modivcare Mobile App
projects.description: React Native Mobile Development - Implemented and maintained new features and handled localization support for 6 languages across those features. Assisted with overall app growth by increasing active users from 20,000 to 300,000 without compromising code quality and maintaining a 4.6 app rating.

projects.title: Cherwell Software
projects.description: Full Stack Web Development - Developed new pages and features while maintaining content and features for the Cherwell site using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and the Sitecore CMS platform. Also assisted with new customer acquisition by developing tools to train clients and inform potential customers on product offerings and services.

projects.title: Cochlear
projects.description: Frontend Developer - Part of the Digital Experience team in charge of maintaining website content, creating new microsites and blogs with HTML, CSS, Javascript and a CMS platform.

projects.title: RentMindMe.com
projects.description: Frontend React Developer - Part of a small development team creating a web-based application designed for property management, rent collection, and facilitating interactions between property owners and renters. Built using HTML, CSS/CSS Grid, React, Redux/Redux Saga, and Google Firebase.

services.title: Frontend
services.description: React Native, React, Redux, Axios, jQuery, CSS Grid

services.title: Other Tools
services.description: Xcode, Android Studio, Firebase, Firestore, Git, Jest, REST APIs, NPM, Yarn, AWS, JIRA, Spanish - Certified Advanced Speaker and Writer by the American Council on the Teaching of Foreign Languages.

aboutpara: Skilled React Native Developer with over 4+ years of mobile development experience and 3 years in the web development space. Proven success developing robust and user-friendly apps, optimizing performance, and managing the entire development cycle from concept to delivery. Experienced in both Android and iOS platforms, as well as JavaScript libraries like Redux and Node.js.
